name: Magic Match Connect
description:
Enjoy a magical time with brand new pair matching game, "Magic Match Connect".
You can win Real World Rewards and Cash Prizes!

Magic Match Connect is the most fun and relaxing matching puzzle game.
Clear tiles as fast as you can and make more Combos to get more Bonus Points!

HOW TO PLAY?
• Tap Identical Tiles to connect them and Clearing Tiles to get points!
• A longer distance between the tiles will earn you more STARS and POINTS!
• Fill the power bar with STARS and earn Power-Up Items!
• Clear all tiles in three minutes to get MORE bonus points!

Simple yet challenging!
• Concentrate on the game to find matching tiles fast as you can!
• Find the best path to earn more STARS!
• Use Power-Up items wisely to keep the Combos!

Compete with others and win prizes!
• Challenge people from all around the world.
• The player who finishes with the most points wins!

Key Features
• Easy to play, best to kill time or win real prizes!
• Various tile images: cute, beautiful and challenging pairs of tiles!
• Great Power-Up Items: Time Bonus, Hint and Bomb
• Train your brain & improve memory

Prize tournaments are not available in the following states: AZ, AR, CT, DE, LA, MT, SC, SD, and TN. If you don’t live in a real prize-enabled region, you can still play for fun with our virtual currency.
